Description.p: A subset of the Snomed-CT clinical terminology (i.e. coding system) intended for use in the UK, previously named SnomedCTUK, that describes an encounter between a care professional and the patient (or patient's record). The patient by be represented by a third party such as a carer or family member.

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Encounter type subset with subset original id 951000000133.
